snippet.title: THE HOUSE OF THE DEAD 2: Remake || Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
We’re excited to share the long-awaited news with you: THE HOUSE OF THE DEAD 2: Remake is coming to Nintendo Switch, PC, Xbox, and PlayStation in Spring 2025!

Wishlist the game now on Steam, GOG, or PlayStation! https://store.steampowered.com/app/3376690/THE_HOUSE_OF_THE_DEAD_2_Remake/
https://www.gog.com/en/game/the_house_of_the_dead_2_remake
https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10011599

THE HOUSE OF THE DEAD 2: Remake is a sequel to the well-known, popular rail-shooter series. Take on the lone role of secret agent James or join forces with agent Gary in a co-op mode and carry out the mission to neutralize the dangerous creatures standing in your way.

-----------------------------
